name: platform
description: This is a little experiment to learn how to use Elm's  `Platform.worker` and make simple command-line interfaces for it.  The worker is a kind of "black box" which accepts  input from a CLI via ports, computes a value from the input, and sends it back to the CLI by ports.  There are two versions of the CLI, described below: a  one-shot version, and a repl.
